title: Saturday Studio: Transmission and Reception (Jan 14)
hero_caption: Himali Singh Soin. Still from Static Range, 2020. Courtesy of the artist
short_description:
Inspired by the exhibition Himali Singh Soin: Static Range, participants are invited to make their own missives (text and drawings) addressing ecological concerns in conversation with Soin’s work. This program is led by visual artist and educator Danielle Wright.

Saturday Studio is an art-making experience in the galleries led by Chicago-based artists that welcomes participants of all experience levels. The program is free with admission, and all materials are provided.
list_description: Saturday Studio is an art-making experience in the galleries that welcomes participants of all experience levels. Led by Chicago-based artists, the program is free with admission, and all materials are provided.
description:
Inspired by the exhibition Himali Singh Soin: Static Range, participants are invited to make their own missives (text and drawings) addressing ecological concerns in conversation with Soin’s work. This program is led by visual artist and educator Danielle Wright.

Saturday Studio is an art-making experience in the galleries led by Chicago-based artists that welcomes participants of all experience levels. The program is free with admission and all materials are provided. 

If you have any questions about programming, please reach out to museum-programs@artic.edu. For questions related to accessibility accommodations, please email access@artic.edu.
